title: And the Land Lay Still
author: Robertson, James
snippet: Bathgate, Linwood, Methil, Uddingston, Dundee, Falkirk, Clydebank – even when he checks the many photos he took of  men gathered round braziers, of  ragged marches snaking along grey streets, of  chained-up gates and derelict sites, the details of  who made what where don't always come back.
